    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:655dbec0-a822-4bc7-9652-a305e837b026</entry>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>655dbec0-a822-4bc7-9652-a305e837b026</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A meleg mérsékelt öv élővilága</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Ecosystem Of The Warm Temperate Region</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Oekosystem Der Warmen Mäßigen Region</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Écosystème de la Région Tempérée Chaude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ecosystem Da Região Temperate Morna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Ecosistema Della Regione Temperata Calda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το οικοσύστημα της θερμής συγκρατημένης περιοχής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ecosistema De la Región Templada Caliente</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A meleg mérsékelt öv éghajlattípusai (mediterrán, monszun), a keménylombú és a babérlombú erdők élővilágának jellemzése; az ember természetátalakító tevékenysége</string>
            <string language="en-US">Climate Types of the Warm Temperate Region (Mediterranean, Monsoon), Describing the Ecosystem of Hard-leaved Forests; Human Activities Changing Nature</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biom</string>
            <string language="en-US">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">mérsékelt övezet</string>
            <string language="en-US">moderate zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">meleg mérsékelt öv</string>
            <string language="en-US">warm-moderate climate belt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">mediterrán</string>
            <string language="en-US">Mediterranean</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima-Typen der warmen mäßigen Region 
(Mittelmeer, Monsun), das Oekosystem der Harten-leaved Wälder 
beschreibend; Menschliche Aktivitäten, die Natur Ändern</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de climat des régions tempérées chaudes 
(méditerranéennes, mousson), décrivant l'écosystème des forêts 
Dures-leaved ; Activités Humaines Changeant La Nature</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos do clima da região temperate morna 
(mediterranean, monsoon), descrevendo o ecosystem de florestas 
Duras-leaved; Atividades Humanas Que Mudam A Natureza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di clima delle regioni temperate calde 
(Mediterraneo, monsone), descriventi l'ecosistema delle foreste 
Dure-leaved; Attività Umane Che Cambiano Natura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι κλίματος των θερμών συγκρατημένων περιοχών 
(Μεσόγειος, μουσώνας), που περιγράφει το οικοσύστημα των 
σκληρός-με φύλλα δασών  Ανθρώπινες δραστηριότητες που 
αλλάζουν τη φύση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos del clima de la región templada caliente 
(mediterránea, monzón), describiendo el ecosistema de bosques 
Duros-leaved; Actividades Humanas Que cambian La Naturaleza</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gemäßigte Zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">warm-gemäßigter Klimariemen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittelmeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone modérée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ceinture chaud-modérée de climat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Méditerranéen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biologia</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμός-μέτρια ζώνη κλίματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεσογειακός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">biología</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
